title: Replace landing header branding with Butterfly Wellness wordmark

requirements.summary: Replace the landing page header branding by removing the SHAMMAH text heading and leaving only a single Butterfly Wellness wordmark image in the header.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx, the header no longer renders the text "SHAMMAH" (the <h1> element is removed).
The header shows only the Butterfly Wellness main wordmark logo image (use the uploaded wordmark image, not the BW icon).
The header logo has an appropriate alt text (e.g., "Butterfly Wellness") and the logo sizing preserves a clean header layout (no overflow or distortion).

file_operations.description:
Update only the landing page header branding area: remove the SHAMMAH

element entirely and ensure the header renders only a single logo with appropriate alt text (e.g., "Butterfly Wellness") and non-distorting sizing (e.g., constrain by height with auto width).

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded Butterfly Wellness wordmark as a static public asset and point the landing page header logo src to that asset using a sanitized filename/path.
acceptanceCriteria: A copy of the uploaded wordmark image (green bw logo.png) exists under frontend/public (recommended under frontend/public/assets/...).
The Landing page header src points to the new public asset path and loads correctly in the browser build without broken links.

file_operations.description: Add a sanitized, space-free copy of the uploaded Butterfly Wellness wordmark image (source: "green bw logo.png") as a static public asset at this path so it can be referenced directly by the landing header .

Change only the header logo src to reference the new public asset path (frontend/public/assets/branding/butterfly-wellness-wordmark.png) and ensure it loads correctly in the built app (no broken link).
